text: The office of the President of the Presidency of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia existed from the death of the President of the Republic for life Josip Broz Tito on 4 May 1980 until the dissolution of the country by 1992. ==List== Portrait Name Representing Term of office Term of office Term of office Political party Note Portrait Name Representing Took office Left office Time in office Political party Note ==References== *
title: President of the Presidency of Yugoslavia
